mapper.sql: PID, PNAME, PCOMS, PPEOPLE, PTYPE, PDEPT, PSOURCE, POTHERS, PDATE, PENDTIME,PRESFROM
mapper.insert: insert into K_PROJECT (PID, PNAME, PCOMS, PPEOPLE, PTYPE, PDEPT, PSOURCE, POTHERS, PDATE, PENDTIME,PRESFROM ) values (#{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pccome,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ppeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcclasify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pdept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{psource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pothers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, to_date(#{pdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{pendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'),#{presfrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into K_PROJECT
PID,
PNAME,
PCOMS,
PPEOPLE,
PTYPE,
PDEPT,

PDATE,
PSTARTTIME,

mapper.update:
update K_PROJECT
PNAME = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PCOMS = #{pcoms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PPEOPLE = #{ppeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PTYPE = #{ptype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PDEPT = #{pdept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PSOURCE = #{psource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POTHERS = #{pothers,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PDATE = #{pdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PSTARTTIME = #{pstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PENDTIME = #{pendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where PID = #{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update K_PROJECT set PNAME = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PCOMS = #{pccome,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PPEOPLE = #{ppeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PTYPE = #{pcclasify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDEPT = #{pdept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PSOURCE = #{psource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POTHERS = #{pothers,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PDATE = to_date(#{pdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), PENDTIME = to_date(#{pendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss'), PRESFROM = #{presfrom,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PID = #{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
